quote: Today, let your heart be your compass and your breath be your anchor.
author: Vani

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Do not be dismayed by the brokenness of the world. All things break. And all things can be mended. Not with time, but with intention.
author: L.R. Knost

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
author: Rumi

quote: What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
author: Buddha

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
author: Caroline Myss

quote: Don’t get lost in your pain, know that one day your pain will become your cure.
author: Rumi

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Act without expectation.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
author: Buddha

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Silence is sometimes the best answer.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Live quietly in the moment and see the beauty of all before you. The future will take care of itself.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart.
author: Carl Jung

quote: When you let go of who you are, you become who you might be.
author: Rumi

quote: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
author: Rumi

quote: Sometimes you don’t realize the weight of something you’ve been carrying until you feel the weight of its release.
author: Unknown

quote: Do everything with a mind that lets go. Do not expect any praise or reward.
author: Ajahn Chah

quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Within you there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

quote: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
author: Buddha

quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
author: Rumi

quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Compassion is the basis of morality.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi
